Ernest, you've been entitle a mission

The individual in the picture above is known to be a dangerous secret agent from the UK and as been causing much disturbance lately. We need to take him down, but first, you will have to find as much as possible about this agent. If you get the right answers to all of the questions bellow, you will gain access to some sensitive data that will help you fulfill your mission. Agent 0040, your country is counting on you.
